message: I would love that. One, single, archived place to chat about live shows would be awesome. IRC rocks, but you can't browse it over if you're late or missed the live ep.
Oh, and Ericflo's vote doesn't count. He wants TWiT for mass-traffic to his sick-as-hell site ;)
When they add more features this will be great but they need an iPhone app and more admin options ASAP.
I hate IRC. Convore would be a great improvment.
I would like Convore because the time zone here in Ozz mean I rarely get to see a live TWIT netcast I could catch up on the chat here.
I like the idea of being able to catch up on chat as well.  The IRC is a little bit of a clique at this point too...
@learnscape more often than not I miss shows in the UK, normally a little too late in the day! Btw good Morning!
Honestly I like it better than IRC.  Then again, anything is better than IRC because it is hard to read if there is much activity.
I like this but does it do live updating?
Sure, if it really turns in to a viable irc successor
@ericflo Cool. Then yes it should. Each show should have it's own group. This is so much nicer than the ugly IRC room. They only need to figure out how to moderate it.
